snippet.title: Maximizing Area of 4-Sided Rectangular Enclosures With a Fixed Perimeter | Optimization
snippet.description: http://tapintoteenminds.com In this video, we will explore Measurement Optimization of Area by working to maximize the area of a 4-sided enclosure in the shape of a rectangle.  The video will begin with a very small width, yielding a narrow rectangle covering a small area.  We then begin increasing the width and watch the area also increase until we hit a maximum area and then watch the area begin to fall again.  The video demonstrates why using a square will always yield the greatest area.
